translation: All glory to Yaśodā’s darling son, Kṛṣṇa, who protects and pleases the cows! All glory to the enchanter of Cupid, the infinite Lord, who takes away all inauspiciousness and grants liberation!
All glory to the infallible Lord, the moon of Vṛndāvan, who pleases Śrī Rādhā! All glory to the dark Flute Player, the ecstasy of the gopīs!
